author: Larry Kim
comment: This is not even close to GTD. Just well-made TODO list. No next action. No delegation. Can't convert an action item to project. Project is not a category, it is some actions which can be broken to small actions. You need to benchmark Everytask app. It is very old app and not user friendly UX, but it has every thing about gtd.

author: Sergiu Plesca
comment: So far so good. A few minor quirks/bugs, but nothing serious. I'm sure it will only get better with time.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks Sergiu! Glad that you like the app so far

author: arnie Singh
comment: Great for managing your projects etc. I have all the versions would be great uf you could sync with ms outlook tasks and calendar, without exchange of course keep updating it with features will only get better cheers

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks for the suggestion Arnie!

author: Ana Adebowale
comment: Works great, but there are 2 things I love about this app and make it my favourite: First is that you can use the same app on all your Android, Ios and Windows devices and the sync is instant and second there is a great customer support available.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks so much Ana!

author: roy bejjani
comment: Task reminder is not working.. i get reminders very late and simultaneously... i already missed couple meetings becoz of that.. plz fix soon.. otherwise app wont be useful to any..

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Hi Roy, thanks for reporting the issue. Please try to remove the app and install it again. Does it fix the issue? If not please email us to cc@tarasov-mobile.com

author: Jackie Anderson
comment: The Best of the best I have tried several different task list and goal setting apps and this one combines both seamlessly. I got this app before reading the GTD book but I found reading it really maximizes the benefit of this app.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks so much for your kind feedback Jackie!

author: Thomas V. Worm
comment: Premium does not work as expected: it does not load the data from the non-premium edition.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content:
HI Thomas. It would be more convenient if you bought Premium within the free app with in-app purchase. Since you purchased the separate Premium app we propose the following:
1) Email us your order number, we will refund the purchase: cc@tarasov-mobile.com
2) Please purchase Premium within the free app
After that you will be all set.

author: Danielle Starmans
comment: This is really very nice. Can you add subtasks? That would make it absolutely perfect!

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks Danielle! Adding subtasks in upcoming releases.

author: Ajay Meena
comment: awesome app...only thing i wanted more is eisenhower matrix type categorisation feature...over all nice app

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Ajay! We'll think about adding this feature.

author: lyndon Hay
comment: Using along with windows application. Syncs well. Great activity organizer. Rapid response to queries from developer.  Fantastic support. Highly recommend this app.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks Lyndon!

author: Shirley Whitfield
comment: I enjoyed it in the past. It was useful. I look forward to using this premium version.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks Shirley! Glad that you like the app.

author: Paul Mordetsky
comment: Works for me for what I need...

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks Paul! Glad you like it

author: Gregory Delrue
comment: great underrated app. Does everything I need and more.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks so much Gregory!

author: Andrew Craig
comment: Excellent app. Great mobile and desktop apps.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks Andrew! Have a productive day

author: David Castillo
comment: Great app! Perfect for GTD!

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks a lot David!

author: David Sidlo
comment: Great for notes and Project tracking.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks David!

comment: Well designed android app

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks! Have a productive week!

author: Vega Lambardt
comment: Good.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks!

author: Dmytro Kostiuchenko
comment: Please update web version or release Linux desktop version. Thanks

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Dmytro. We'll see what we can do

author: Mahatma Tocamon
comment: In general, the app is great. Definitely worth the price. I might use this forever. It helps me organize my life. At first I was looking for Omnifocus, cause a friend of mine told me to. But I don't buy apple products, and Chaos Control fulfils my needs.  One quick complaint, though: I can't put daily repetitive tasks that have no start and due dates... for certain tasks that I should do every day, but if I don't do it one day, I just wanna skip to the next day
title: Best app for GTD

author: Evan Case
comment: I love this app and use it often.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Hi Evan, thanks. Could you please send us a mail to cc@tarasov-mobile.com and describe the issue with the website?

title: Perfect

author: gaurav moolani
comment: Only thing that is remaining is giving priority to list objects.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks for the suggestion. We are adding this functoon in upcoming updates.

title: Best To Do app

author: steven rizzie
comment: Keeps my life well organized
title: Good app

author: Duncan Greaves
comment: Well thought out and beautifully designed. My only complaint is that the image that appears on the main menu does nothing but consume space. It looks amateurish and interferes with the Android Wear view. Five stars if it can be eliminated.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks for the suggestion Duncan

title: Great app

author: Doris Latimore Johnson
comment: On my 8 inch tablet and the upgrade to Android's Marshmallow version, it is much easier for me to view and learn how to use Chaos Control. I had upgraded to Premium a while ago. Now it will be easier to learn. One of my favorite options still is reminders for both start and end dates. End date reminders are especially useful when juggling longer term activities, their intermediate actions, or multiple concurrent activities.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Hey, thanks for the feedback! Glad you liked the app!

title: Great look with update to Marshmallow (Android).

author: Kerry Dawson
comment: The program is very easy to understand, use and fast at input. It is easy to see what needs doing and why. The interface especially needs work on IOS though. Android and the Mac are great. A few extra views and filters to specify what you need to see will make the program almost perfect. P

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback Kerry!

title: With a little Polish could be a Perfect GTD App

author: Victoria Chronister
comment: I really like this app. It's quite helpful.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks Victoria!

title: I knew I would eventually get the full version

author: Jonathan Jebasingh
comment: Absolutely easy to use :) great app and development !

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks so much Jonathan!

title: Love ir

author: Steel Dove
comment: Great app. The chaos box is perfect for me. Great customer support.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks a lot! Glad you like your experience with us so far

title: Awesome app

author: john main account
comment: Fantastic service

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks John! Glad you like it!

author: Givano Ramadhan
comment: None of my suggestion being replied.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: I'm afraid that is not true Givano.

author: Carrie L
comment: Love the app and the new material design. Only thing it is missing is the ability to change the colour. Many material design apps have this now, and I very much miss it in this app. I have supported the dev by both getting the premium app and pre ordering the PC version, so hopefully they will add this ability to customize the colour :). Thank you for listening and for a great app!

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Hey Carrie, thanks for the feedback!

title: Really good--customizations please?

author: Michael Lowe
comment: Gtd at your fingertips

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks a lot Michael! Please note that we've just released a native Windows app.

title: Very useful

author: Kevin Lidtka
comment: Perfect GTD app!  I was looking for a good replacement to Omnifocus and this one is the very best out there.  When used with the web app I am able to organize anything and everything that comes up.  The only thing I would ask for by the developers is better widgets.  It would be great to have a widget which displays a project like One-step Actions.  As it is right now, I am not able to use the current widgets because they don't have features that I would use very often.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Hey Kevin, please note that we've just released a native Windows app. It is more useful than our web app, so please consider giving it a try

title: Perfect GTD app!

author: Shane Coates
comment: I love the system of the chaos box! It really helps me to be much more productive at work. The beauty of the app is that you can add thoughts and tasks as soon as you think of them, and you know where to find them! No more post its and jotted notes around the office. If I could ask for one addition to the app it would be to be able to see gmail/outlook calendar items within the app itself - this would make choosing due time/dates a lot easier if your week is often full of meetings.
title: Very useful and worth the purchase!

author: Marcin Szczepanek
comment: Overall this the greatest GTD app I've encourted, but is it too difficult to make multiple contexts possible? Make It happen and, I'll make it 5 star ASAP. I see it's the last thing to do in evolution tab, hopefully I'll find the app that meets my expectations in the meantime.

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Marcin. We are adding multiple contexts in future.

title: Multiple contexts

author: Dan Plumadore
comment: I switched over to Chaos Control as I became very disappointed with another app I had used for months and I am so glad I did. Packed with features that allow me to utilize my creativity to its full potential rather than be penalized for it. Goals, tasks,  and projects are all prioritized and get done. Use this app and be better for it. Well done, devs!

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Wow, thanks for your kind feedback Dan! Glad that you like the app!

title: Loving it so far

author: Neil Darlow
comment: On my Xperia Z3 Compact the app runs fine but on my SmartWatch 3 the Chaos Control launch icon just shows a green busy spinner on a white background. After a while the screen returns to the watch face. Edit: Restarting the watch displayed a tasks notification. Is the launch icon actually meant to do anything interactively?

reply.author: Chaos Control
reply.content: Hi Neil. Yes, launching the icon should open a task list for today. Please try to remove the app, install again and see if it works (don't forget to sync your data before re-installing).

title: Not working on Android Wear OS 5.1.1

author: Andrew Scott
comment: I use it to keep multiple project & prospective shopping lists. So for me, I check a task when I want to attend to it, not when it is completed. Other than these items being "greyed" until I uncheck them it works great. I love being able to file lists within folders. If you don't want to have to redo your lists when your device fails (like happened to me) get the premium version.
title: Creative misuse?

author: José M. Velázquez
comment: Bought this app and have been very pleased with it so far, however the repeat task options are a bit limited for me. I require to set repeating tasks on the first Monday of the month, or the last weekday, etc... but it is currently not possible to do that. Otherwise, pretty impressive app.
title: Almost... Almost perfect
